description: You and your foe both stumble.
Foe recognizes this assault from grade school.
Powerful strike fails to land solid. It still does some damage.
Foe seeks to push you away. He lashes out in defensive manner.
On line strike, but weak. Foe steps back and feigns an attack to draw off your assault.
Light bash breaks foe's focus. You have the initiative next round.
Attempt to spin foe's around almost succeeds. Weak grip to side.
Firm press to foe's chest. He give ground happily. Watch his weapon.
Strike thigh. Foe is pushed back.
Foe's arm is pinned for a moment. He recovers by twisting you off.
Shoulder strike sends foe spinning. He comes all the way around before stopping. Well placed shot.
Hasty press upon foe's chest produces excellent results. Foe is unbalanced.
Hammer foe's lower leg. He has trouble standing, but manages.
Blow to foe's shield side. If foe has a shield, it is torn away.
Side strike. Disoriented foe strikes out for you in the wrong direction. You move to take advantage.
Elbow to the back. Foe stumbles 5 feet sideways. Foe cannot seem to get his head clear.
Head strike. If foe has no helm, he is knocked out for 2 hours. If foe has a helm, he is better off.
Strike to foe's stomach. He bends down in pain and you send him sprawling on his face. He hits harder than you could have hoped.
Brutal hip strike knocks foe down. Fall tears tendons, and fractures bone in leg. The pain his great. Foe is incoherent for 9 hours.
You lunge 5 feet past your foe.
Your opponent stands firmly in front of you.
Weak side strike glances off kidneys. It could have been great.
Glancing side blow. You unbalance your foe. He recovers quickly.
Your strike makes foe's footing uncertain. He pushes you clear and begins to right himself.
You salvage your attack by tripping foe. You have the initiative next round.
Your assault threatens to succeed. Your foe goes defensive to avoid your attack.
Grab foe and bring knee up to cause damage. Foe blocks some of the force.
Foe bumps his thigh while blocking your attack. He steps back.
Bend weapon arm in the wrong direction. Foe drops his weapon.
Strike to foe's elbow numbs it. He drops his weapon and grips his elbow. He forgets you are still attacking him.
Grab loose piece of foe's garments and use it to throw him around. Foe is confused.
Solid damage to foe's calf. His attempts to avoid the pain make him an easier target.
Grab foe's shield arm for leverage. You treat it badly, trying to unbalance foe.
Good shot to foe's side sends him stumble to the right 3 feet. It must have really hurt.
You really hammer foe. He reels back 10 feet. He almost went down. You move in to finish him.
Blow to side of foe's head. Strike damages his ear and balance. Foe is impaired for 3 weeks.
Bash foe in his side. His legs forget to follow as he steps back. He falls in an embarrassing prone position. He has no clue to what happened.
Send foe flying 10 feet. He lands on his face. The twisting of his neck causes nerve damage. He is paralyzed from the waist down.
Try again. What will your friends say?
When your attempt starts to fail, you slip in a punch.
Knuckle foe's arm. You will need to do better than this.
Strike side. Foe moves back to block your next attack.
Shot to foe's chest. His lungs hesitate. He coughs it off and regains his footing.
Grab foe's shoulder, while you brin
Boom! Foe is hit in the face. He reels back 5 feet trying to regain his footing. His guard is down.
Push foe's knee backwards. Foe struggles to avoid the pain.
Skipping calf strike. Foe does not give ground.
Excellent placement. Strike to weapon arm disarms foe. Foe is in great peril.
Strike to foe's leg sends him down. Foe's knee is broken and his doom is at hand. He falls to the ground helpless.
Strike to foe's ribs. Foe's ribs crack and foe shows the pain. His war effort is impaired.
Bruise foe's leg. Muscles suffer damage and foe limps back from your reach.
Heavy blow to foe's weapon arm. Mild fracture. Foe is knocked back 5 feet.
Strike to foe's side. He almost goes down, but recovers by dropping everything in his shield arm.
Precise blow sends foe down. Foe is face down and disarmed.
Spin foe around. He ends up 10 feet from you and facing the wrong direction. Foe fumbles his weapon.
Smooth and snazzy strike sends foe down on his knees. His weapon goes flying. Foe has blacked out. He stares straight ahead without blinking.
Powerful strike flips foe into the air before smashing him to the ground. Foe breaks both arms and hits his head. Foe is in a coma for 2 months.
You're not very good, are you?
Your grip is neither firm or effective. Foe breaks free.
Back strike. It has little imagination. You might as well punch.
Blow to foe's side sends him reeling. Foe checks wound for the damage.
Quick shot to chest causes foe to hesitate in pain.He still knows you're there.
Strike to calf. Wound impairs foe's movements. You have the initiative.
Double strike to both arms breaks foe's defense. He is open to attack and is having trouble recovering.
Strike to chest takes wind out of foe. Foe's guard goes down.
Miss foe's side and strike his thigh. You have initiative for 3 rounds.
You catch foe's counter thrust and disarm him with a bash to the arm.
Hard strike to head. If foe has no helm, he is knocked out for 24 hours. If he has a helm, he is knocked back 10 feet.
Break foe's collar bone. Spin foe around. He is disoriented and out of position.
Lift foe up into the air. You send him sprawling on the ground. He drops his weapon.
Sweep foe to the side and knock him over. He breaks his ankle.
Brutal strike sends foe down. You step on his weapon arm and hold it down. Foe should surrender.
Strike foe's shield arm. If foe has a shield it is broken. If not the arm is broken.
Foe stumbles back from you 10 feet and takes a full round to fall. He hits hard and fractures an arm. He is down.
Strike head and shatter foe's helm. Pieces fly in all diections. If foe has no helm he is in a coma for 4 weeks.
Savage blow to foe's head. Foe is knocked down. He falls into a coma and dies in 12 rounds due to a severed vein.
You made a good sound effect.
It is solid, even if randomly placed.
Strike lands on shoulder blade.
Blow to foe's side unbalances him and destroys equipment there.
Crack! Foe's rib reports damage to him in an unsubtle way. He is in pain.
Hard glancing blow to foe's leg.
Shot in back staggers foe for an instant. His guard drops and he is sadly unprotected.
Knock foe over as if he was a sack of beans. He hits and starts to stand up.
Strike causes foe to fumble his stride. He almost falls down. Foe is recovering.
Bash foe in shoulder making him spin. You push him for good measure.
Knock foe back with a blow to the jaw. Foe loses balance and falls. he hits his head and goes unconscious.
Shoulder strike blasts foe down. He lands on his stomach and tries to roll over. Minor fracture.
Knock foe down with a blow to the thigh. He lands on his wespon and takes some time to get off it.
Strike to foe's shield arm. Foe stumbles 3 feet and falls down. Foe is disarmed.
Awesome side shot sends foe tripping sideways. He goes down rolling and breaks a leg.
Cruel blow to foe's head.... Foe sees stars. Foe is knocked back 10 feet, but remains standing.
Blow to foe's shield shoulder. If foe has no shield, he is knocked down,has a useless arm, and passes out.
Solid strike snaps foe's neck. He falls back 5 feet, spins, and tumbles to the ground. He dies of shock and suffocation in 3 rounds.
Frightening strike to foe's head. Temple crushed, neck broken. Foe lands 20 feet away. He dies instantly.
